about_the_game:
You've just been appointed as a Vedmaak—a top-tier warrior and seasoned bounty-hunter, sought for missions far surpassing the abilities of ordinary fighters. With expertise in melee combat, marksmanship, and practical magic, you're a force to be reckoned with. In Vedmaak, a single player Action RPG, engage in turn-based combat within the fantastical realm of Tojsvět. Prepare for intense battles, loot collection, and epic adventures.

World and Story
In the world of Tojsvět, the stage is set for the action-packed journey of Vedmaak.. The peaceful land of Niva faces invasion by Czart and his army of minions. As a freshly appointed Vedmaak, you take it upon yourself to aid the people of Vrangrad, the capital of Niva, and restore peace to the land.

Gameplay
Vedmaak is an Action RPG that centers on turn-based combat, where the main focus is battling enemies and gathering loot.

Character Customization
Create and personalize your character, molding and advancing them along the path you choose. Select from a combination of available items and character stats to forge a mighty Vedmaak, ready to vanquish Czart and his army of minions.

Combat
Vedmaak provides two options for turn-based combat: normal and fast. In normal mode, each character takes a turn in a round. Fast mode, on the other hand, splits each round into two turns: one for the player and one for all enemies. By combining the combat options of normal and fast, along with the ability to use mouse and keyboard controls, players can choose between a more tactical turn-based fighting style or a slightly closer-to-real-time combat experience.

Randomness
Levels, enemies, loot, and shop items are randomly generated, ensuring a fresh experience with each gameplay session.

Important
Before starting the game, please read the manual. This game combines real-time exploration with turn-based combat, and certain actions vary depending on the mode.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
Cartoon Violence

  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-10105 CPU @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3 / OpenGL ES 3.0 compatible hardware, Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
